site_name: NATURE PARK AT THE SHELL FACTORY

citations.narrative:
The metal fencing in front of the petting zoo's outdoor enclosure has numerous areas of chipped paint and rust.
These areas need to be repaired or replace because the are not abled properly cleaned and paint chips could be
ingested. Outdoor housing facilities shall be shall be maintained in good repair to protect the animals.
TO BE CORRECTED BY: JULY 18, 2015
Exit interview was conducted with the Curator.

narrative:
3.125(a)
FACILITIES, GENERAL.   
The metal fencing in front of the petting zoo's outdoor enclosure has numerous areas of chipped paint and rust.
These areas need to be repaired or replace because the are not abled properly cleaned and paint chips could be
ingested. Outdoor housing facilities shall be shall be maintained in good repair to protect the animals.
